publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-4046.1 Mr Mike Rumbles: Scottish Agricultural College Restructuring—As an amendment to motion (S1M-4046) in the name of Alex Fergusson, leave out from "potential" to end and insert "Scottish Agricultural College’s educational and advisory services."
S1M-4046.1 Scottish Agricultural College Restructuring (lodged on 19 March 2003) Richard Lochhead*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Alex Johnstone*

S1M-4046.1 Mr Mike Rumbles: Scottish Agricultural College Restructuring—As an amendment to motion (S1M-4046) in the name of Alex Fergusson, leave out from "potential" to end and insert "Scottish Agricultural College’s educational and advisory services." Supported by: Richard Lochhead, Mr Jamie Stone, Alex Johnstone
S1M-4046.1 Scottish Agricultural College Restructuring (lodged on 19 March 2003) Robin Harper*, Stewart Stevenson*
S1M-4046.1 Scottish Agricultural College Restructuring (lodged on 19 March 2003) Donald Gorrie*

S1M-4046.1 Mr Mike Rumbles: Scottish Agricultural College Restructuring—As an amendment to motion (S1M-4046) in the name of Alex Fergusson, leave out from "potential" to end and insert "Scottish Agricultural College’s educational and advisory services." Supported by: Richard Lochhead, Mr Jamie Stone, Alex Johnstone, Robin Harper, Stewart Stevenson, Donald Gorrie
